title: Let there be a doodle

Since it's out, I might as well complete the set! Here's a drawing of Gabrielle from Let there be green. Hope yall like it..

This piece is based off: [[[let-there-be-green|]]]

The other two pieces I've drawn based off "Princess Arthur and the knights of the roundtable":
